name: Liip
tag_list: agile, web, development, scrum, niwea, moodle, e-learning
overview:
Liip stands for agile web development with open source standards and open industry standards. With a human-centered approach and a long-standing commitment for sustainability Liip develops and designs high-end web-based application for a wide range of users and devices.

Liip provides consulting and conceptual design, web application development and agile operations and support services. We build scalable custom web applications, e-learning and social media solutions and create effective lightweight content management solutions.

Liip runs three offices in Switzerland, Fribourg, Zurich and Berne, employing more than 60 specialists providing development, design and consulting services in four languages (German, French, English, Italian). The company owned by its employees in its entirety and is growing continuously in size and reputation.
